title: #GreenHeart Challenge: Bernard Mensah joins in on Tonaton Green Heart Campaign
text:
15:11 CET #GreenHeart Challenge: Bernard Mensah joins in on Tonaton Green Heart Campaign - www.allsports.com.gh 
Ghana midfielder Bernard Mensah has donated to Tonaton's Green Heart Campaign, geared towards raising funds and public awareness on autism in the country. Actor 
Movie star John Dumelo had earlier donated to the campaign and issued a challenge to artiste Deborah Vanessa to follow suit, not unlike previous ones, such as the Ice Bucket challenge, and one she duly accepted. 
As part of the online retailer's campaign to increase awareness of the condition, Mensah, who now plies his trade with Spanish club Getafe, has donated his jerseys and the proceeds from the sale will benefit Autism Awarenes and Traning Centre. 
Mensah's effort is expected to persuade other Ghanaian footballers to join the campaign over the next few weeks while members of the public are also encouraged to The items donated will be auctioned off on Tonaton.com and the proceeds from it will be given to the fund.
